attributes.action: Celtic FC won a Treble Treble of domestic trophies they should now keep them
attributes.additional_details: Celtic FC have now won the Scottish premier league, Scottish Cup and League Cup for the last 3 years only losing 9 domestic games in that time one year went undefeated in all competions
attributes.background: Celtic FC have now won the SPL, Scottish and League Cups 3 years in a row, known as the Treble Treble, I feel that the Club should now be given the trophies to keep as their own for achieving this unprecedented achievement which never been done before by any club in the world
